ResearchProjectDef.label: coal crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a use for all that coal you have languishing in your stockpile. Unless you got rid of it all, in which case I offer you my condolences.

ResearchProjectDef.label: concrete armor gland
ResearchProjectDef.description: Go even further beyond stoneskin glands. Embrace concrete by BECOMING concrete itself. Is it sacrilege? Perhaps. Is it really cool? YES.

ResearchProjectDef.label: going Fully Ottomatic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the secrets of the legendary fighter dubbed "Fully Ottomatic" in order to capture but a glimpse of his mighty power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: apotheosis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combine the power of Fully Ottomatic, V.O.I.D., and coal into one glorious weapon. This weapon is actually absurd.
